name: Accountancy Europe
legal: Association internationale sans but lucratif AiSBL, established  on 20 January 1987
memberOrga: Our members are 51 institutes of professional accountants and auditors from 36 European countries, see https://www.accountancyeurope.eu/members/
goal:
Accountancy Europe (formerly Federation of European Accountants - FEE) unites 51 professional organisations from 36 countries that represent 1 million professional accountants, auditors and advisors. Professional accountants make numbers work for people. As Accountancy Europe, we translate their daily experience from across Europe to inform the European policy debate.
Good decisions start with reliable information. Professional accountants provide trust, integrity, and transparency to decision-makers in both the public and private sectors. As professional bodies, our members ensure the high quality of the work of professional accountants and their ethical behaviour.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Sustainable finance
Anti-money laundering / counter-terrorism financing
Tax policy (including VAT)
Non-financial and diversity information reporting
Financial reporting (IFRS)
Audit and assurance
Professional ethics
Public sector accounting
SME policy
Corporate governance
Capital Markets Union
